pageTitle: Endura Clickfast 8-Panel Coolmax Mesh Liner | Competitive Cyclist
title: Endura Men's Apparel
textBeforeTable: Men's Apparel Endura Size chart 1 year Manufacturer Warranty: layering Recommended Use: none Pockets: integrated Chamois: 80% nylon, 20% spandex Material: Tech Specs The Endura Clickfast Eight-Panel CoolMax Mesh liner can be used as a replacement liner on any short that comes with a Clickfast liner or can be purchased as the liner for any Endura short that is Clickfast compatible. There are four sets of Clickfast tabs in the short. The inseam on the Medium short is 10". Small to XXL sizes. They are cycling shorts -- there's a 400-series Endura stretch chamois inside. There are silicone gel leg grippers. The shorts fit like a second skin. Still, they're best worn under shorts. There are CoolMax Lycra front and rear panels, but the side panels are wicking stretch mesh panels that are best only seen by an intimate. Not that we're modest;
textAfterTable: How to Measure: For best results, take measurements over your underwear. Chest: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. Natural Waist: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape a bit loose. Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your body at the top of your legs. Inseam: Using pants that fit well, measure the crotch seam to the bottom of the leg.
